item.title: OSMF Board Election soon! Less than 24 hours to add your question to the curated Q&A list! https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Talk:Foundation/AGM2024/Election_to_Board (PS ofc you can ask candidates at any time) #OpenStreetMap #OSM

OSMF Board election soon. Do you want to ask candidates questions? ü§î Add them to the wiki page! üìù In less than a week we'll assemble & copyedit them for the candidates https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Talk:Foundation/AGM2024/Election_to_Board (PS. yes you can ask candidates Q's at any time)

‚è∞ Less than 24 hours left to nominate yourself as a candidate for the OpenStreetMap Foundation Board of Directors! Last chance to tell someone that they should stand for election! üòÅ üí™ üëÄ All info here: https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Foundation/AGM2024/Election_to_Board#Board_candidates #OpenStreetMap #OSM #OSMF #OSMFoundation

üì£ The deadline to submit a poster to @sotm 2024 is AUGUST 25. üì£ Don't miss your change to showcase your visualisations using OpenStreetMap data and maps. https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2024/07/08/sotm-2024-call-for-posters/

üéÅ HAPPY BIRTHDAY OpenStreetMap! You've come a long way in the last 20 years. üòç Pictured here are our servers freshly racked up in 2011 and a new database server from 2012. This would be our last spinning rust (mechanical hard disk) database server. 36 drive bays! Future database servers used SSD disks. More about OSM's 20th Birthday (which is today): https://birthday20.openstreetmap.org/ #20YearsOfOSM #OpenData #OpenStreetMap #OSM a rack of computer serversa computer server sitting on a sack truck, outside

üéÅ HAPPY BIRTHDAY OpenStreetMap! You've come a long way in the last 20 years. üòç Here's Matt Amos in 2009 after we re-organised our server racks. Server lower middle left (with blue disk caddies) was our new database server installed earlier in the year. More about OSM's 20th Birthday (which is today): https://birthday20.openstreetmap.org/ #20YearsOfOSM #OpenData #OpenStreetMap #OSM a white man, with black hair working in a server room

üéÅ HAPPY BIRTHDAY OpenStreetMap! You've come a long way in the last 20 years. üòç Here's @gravitystorm at the rear of server racks in UCL after a long work session in 2009 extending our rack depth and re-organising our servers. More about OSM's 20th Birthday (which is today): https://birthday20.openstreetmap.org/ #20YearsOfOSM #OpenData #OpenStreetMap #OSM a white man with ginger hair, in a server room, looking at some server cables

üéÅ HAPPY BIRTHDAY OpenStreetMap! Today is OSM's 20th Brithday! üéÇ üéÇ Here's SteveC's desktop at University College London, the original OSM "server" until 2006. You've come a long way in the last 20 years. üòç https://birthday20.openstreetmap.org/ #20YearsOfOSM #OpenData #OpenSource #OpenStreetMap #OSM photo of an old battered desktop computer. It looks grimey, has a floppy disk and CD drive, and a peeled off sticker on it

"OpenStreetMap has grown exponentially or quadratically over the last twenty years depending on the metric you‚Äôre interested in...The story isn‚Äôt so much about the data and technology, and it never was. It‚Äôs the people. " -- Steve Coast, reflecting on 20 years of OpenStreetMap on the OSM blog https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2024/08/09/openstreetmap-at-20/ #20YearsofOSM #HappyBirthdayOSM

Less than a week left to nominate yourself as a candidate for the OpenStreetMap Foundation Board of Directors! Or to convince someone you know to run! Have you considered running? üôÇ All info here: https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Foundation/AGM2024/Election_to_Board#Board_candidates #OpenStreetMap #OSM #OSMF #OSMFoundation
We are aware of the current website and API outage. Our community forum at https://community.openstreetmap.org is online.

You might be wondering, why is cake such a part of OSM anniversary celebrations? At OSM's "Mapchester" mapping party in Manchester, UK in 2006, a "cake diagram" was used to split the project into logical sectors with sector references. https://birthday20.openstreetmap.org/ A "cake diagram" for the Mapchester mapping event.

It's time to choose the next group of board members for the OSMF. Submission of self-nominations for the 2024 OSMF board election is open. https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Foundation/AGM2024/Election_to_Board#Submission_of_self-nominations (Please read the eligibility requirements!) üì£ Deadline: 13 August 2024, 23:59:59 UTC

Have you listed your local event on the OSM 20th Birthday wiki and the website yet? üëâ 20th anniversary event wiki: https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/OpenStreetMap_20th_Anniversary_Birthday_party üëâ 20th anniversary event map, timeline and birthday card: http://birthday20.openstreetmap.org

üí´ Call for Posters! State of the Map 2024, Nairobi, Kenya üåç Showcase your project or map visualisation at the State of the Map 2024! The Call for Poster for SotM 2024 is now open! https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2024/07/08/sotm-2024-call-for-posters/
‚åõ One week left for early bird registration for the 2024 #sotm in Nairobi, Kenya. Visit https://2024.stateofthemap.org/tickets/ for all the details. #opendata #osmscience #foss4G #osm

Like doing visualisations with OSM? Showcase your project or map at the State of the Map 2024! Options include: how well your home region is mapped; a beautiful new style or map; a community project or statistic; an explanation or invitation to use OpenStreetMap--just to name a few. What is important is that we want it to be about OSM. We also welcome academic posters about research around OSM data. https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2024/07/08/sotm-2024-call-for-posters/
üì£ Deadline Extended! The early bird deadline for the 2024 #SotM in Nairobi, Kenya on September 6-8 has been extended to July 31. Register today!

Are you ready to celebrate TWENTY years of mapping? Join us 09Aug2024 for OSM's global 20th birthday celebration. - Share the date/time/coordinates of your event - Sign the OSM 20th birthday card - Share photos & map viz with #20YearsofOSM https://birthday20.openstreetmap.org/ Are you ready to celebrate TWENTY years of mapping? Join us 09Aug2024 for the #OpenStreetMap global 20th birthday celebration. - Share the date/time/coordinates of your event - Sign the OSM 20th birthday card - Share photos & map viz with #20YearsofOSM https://birthday20.openstreetmap.org/ image caption: Feye Andal shows of a cake during a get-togeher in Manila, celebrating the 18th OpenStreetMap anniversary

> For a vibrant consumer navigational ecosystem to emerge, society needs to invest in OpenStreetMap as a public good. ‚Ä¶ City planners should dedicate staffers to updating their roads and bridges on OpenStreetMap. Communities should submit updates with roads and hazards in their local areas We quite agree! üòç From @Julia's recent Op. Ed. in the #NewYorkTimes, ‚ÄúYour Driving App Is Leading You Astray‚Äù üì∞ read here: https://www.nytimes.com/2024/07/10/opinion/google-maps-driving-apps-flaws.html?unlocked_article_code=1.6E0.yGok.7gErcSBb7E43&smid=url-share #OpenStreetMap #OSM #gischat #FreeMaps
